be	offered	a	further	scan.	A

two separate placentas. This 
happens when the fertilised 
egg	splits	in	the	first	3–4	days	
after conception and before it 
implants in the uterus.
What	is	different	about	
being pregnant with twins 
or more?
Multiple pregnancies have a 
higher risk of complications 
–	particularly	premature	
birth. If your babies share a 
placenta (identical twins) or if 
you are having more than two 
babies,	you	should	be	offered
